item.description:
We'll start at Copley Square, walk down Comm Ave to Kenmore, then Beacon Street to Cleveland Circle.

Meet at the benches between the park area and Dartmouth St.

The Copley Farmers Market is held on Tuesdays and runs until 6pm, but they're usually out there a little after 6 too, so you might be able to look around before the walk.

This is about 4 miles, and will take about 45 minutes.
item.how_to_find_us: My cell # is 617-968-8113 - call/text/email if you're late or lost. I'll be there with a green coat and jeans.
item.name: Copley to Cleveland Circle via Beacon St. (4 miles)
